boardsDescription.merge: Combine PDFs in the order you want with the easiest PDF merger available.
boardsDescription.split: Separate one page or a whole set for easy conversion into independent PDF files.
boardsDescription.compress: Reduce file size while optimizing for maximal PDF quality.
boardsDescription.wordToPDF: Make DOC and DOCX files easy to read by converting them to PDF.
boardsDescription.PDFToPowerPoint: Turn your PDF files into easy to edit PPT and PPTX slideshows.
boardsDescription.PowerPointToPDF: Make PPT and PPTX slideshows easy to view by converting them to PDF.
boardsDescription.JPGToPDF: Convert JPG images to PDF in seconds. Easily adjust orientation and margins.
boardsDescription.PDFToJPG: Convert each PDF page into a JPG or extract all images contained in a PDF.

mergePage.title: Merge PDF files
mergePage.text: Combine PDFs in the order you want with the easiest PDF merger available.

compressPage.title: Compress PDF files
compressPage.text: Reduce file size while optimizing for maximal PDF quality.

notification.notPDF: The file is not a PDF
notification.fileAddError: Error adding file, try again later
notification.twoCountFiles: Please upload at least two files to combine
notification.oneCountFiles: Please upload at least one file to combine
